ValidationRule.description: Ensures no more than the maximum allowed assignments are allowed on BOFE Legal referrals
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ( RecordType.Name = 'BOFE Request for Legal Court Action' || RecordType.Name = 'BOFE Request for Legal Services' ) && Referral_Assignments__c > 1 ) || RecordType.Name = 'BOFE Civil Litigation Referral' && Referral_Assignments__c > 5
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have assigned too many individuals to this referral type.
